quote: Jason Awbrey delivered the solo with a finely textured baritone, elegant diction and sensitive shaping of lines.
warmly rich below, rising to top notes either clarion or sweetly floated, as appropriate, everything finely focused.
Jason H. Awbrey's warmly intoned solo ... worth the price of admission.
Jason Awbrey provided the baritone solo in a voice that would be coveted by most English cathedral choirs.
And the soloists, one after another, sang radiantly. Who wouldn't have been transfixed?
Jason sang with heart rending beauty and sensitivity.
Jason Awbrey has one of the most gorgeous baritones on earth.
Jason Awbrey was a resonant and commanding soloist.
Any chance to listen to his radiant baritone is welcome.
Jason Awbrey's honeyed baritone was perfect.
Baritone Jason Awbrey sang the solo gloriously.
Jason Awbrey the elegantly commanding baritone
